Articles.Content:
It was working last night but install mods then been get crash to desktop saying https://pastebin.com/1DRr41f1 , here is screen shot http://imgur.com/a/Qwaoj  

 I even removed KSP and just did fresh install with no mods still same problem. Both 32bit and 64bit. There is no log file being created either.

 

Thanks

Chances are pretty high that you reinstalled the game through Steam, which will leave all the mods exactly where you put them. You have to manually remove them.

If that's not the case you should look for the actual logs:

No it was not mods, I said it was clean install  

It was antivirus causing the issue.

Antivirus and firewall can cause problems indeed. Especially on steam. I always make an exception in the virusscanner itself that it can skip my folder where ever I install games. It has solved a few bugs for me in KSP and some other loading errors in games.
